algorithm_technique: Iterate through quadrants, count flips for palindromic pairs, adjust for center row/column and total 1s count.
problem_summary_simple: Flip minimum cells to make all rows/columns palindromic and total 1s divisible by 4.
problem_summary_technical: Greedily minimizes flips for 2x2 subgrids, then handles center row/column and divisibility by 4 constraint.
key_insights: The core idea is to make 2x2 subgrids palindromic by flipping the minimum number of cells.
The middle row and column need special handling if dimensions are odd.
The constraint of total 1s divisible by 4 is handled by adjusting flips based on the parity of existing 1s.
